ygData.subject: training points and spell research
ygData.msgSnippet: I m currently level 6 and have only used one of my training points to train in meditation. I assume that once I hit a certain level I ll realize what s lacking
ygData.messageBody: I'm currently level 6 and have only used one of my training points to train in meditation. I assume that once I hit a certain level I'll realize what's lacking and then train alot in that, but any suggestions would be helpful. I was also saving up for spell research. Is spell research a skill that goes up quickly? Also, what does raising the spell research skill improve? All help is appreciated. Thanks, Lott.
